meals.title: Vegetable Pho
meals.description: Ginza Pho is a spicy, light and aromatic noodle soup served piping hot.

meals.title: Tonkatsu Ramen
meals.description: Our bespoke ramen comes with handmade noodles, a wide array of toppings and homemade broth.

meals.title: Teriyaki Donburi
meals.description: A crown pleaser, our homemade teriyaki sauce served with chicken or tofu and greens.

meals.title: Vermicelli Donburi
meals.description: Modern fusion dish combining rice noodles with a classic rice bowl. Vegetarian option available.

meals.title: Nigiri Plate
meals.description: A selection of our finest nigiri: choose from salmon, tuna, tilapia, surimi, prawns and vegetarian options.

meals.title: GRILLED BEEF
meals.description: Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia.
